name: Aerdeets
description: A tech blog about web development, programming, and other tech stuff I and a few other folks find interesting.

name: Hitlist
description: A cloud-based CLI tool that allows you to execute multiple commands with a single command, plus a web dashboard for easy command management on the go on any device.

name: PHP Router
description: A composer package that brings Express-like routing to PHP with support for middleware, class-based callbacks, dynamic routes etc and still remains subjective; you write it your way (and yes, it is a terrible name sadly).
